title: You Have Disconnected. Please Check Your Internet Connection - PROBLEM
body:
This Message Has Been Popping Up Every time I Try To Play A League Match Which Is A Big Problem, Obviously Because I Cant Play. I Have No Idea How To Fix This. (Ima stop capping the start of every word now) i tried to reinstall league and stuff like that, my firewall is disabled for the time being so that means it is not the fire wall that is blocking my connection to league servers so what is it?
I dont know
will i ever know
i dont know
thank you for your time
